terms.term: A JSON file used by Electron to produce their .d.ts. Generated with every release.
The ElectronApi.Json.Parser project which reads the electron-api.json file.
A F# JSON decoder and encoder with functional declaration and configuration.
from (kebab case) some-identifier to (camel case) someIdentifier
from (kebab case) some-identifier to (pascal case) SomeIdentifier
from (pascal case) SomeIdentifier to (kebab case) some-identifier
